revised_title: On the Volumes of Pedal Surfaces and Their Geometric Properties
tldr: The author investigates the volume and geometric properties of pedal surfaces, establishing relationships between the origins of pedals of equal volume and their positions on a surface of the third order. The study also reveals that when the primitive surface is closed, the loci of pedal origins form a system of concentric quadrics, with the origin of the pedal of least volume at the center.
